AboutPage.title: Engineering immersive urban journeys
AboutPage.summary: We blend architecture, responsive media, and civic technology to transform streets into playful destinations.

mission.title: Mission first
mission.body: Design adaptive infrastructure that invites neighbors to explore their city differently.

team.title: Interdisciplinary team
team.body: Architects, artists, and engineers prototype together to keep experiences human.

impact.title: Measured impact
impact.body: Installations already activate plazas across twelve cities worldwide.
